page.title: 11LLANGURIG, HEALTH
page.content: Virtually all the inhabitants are served by Dr Graham Davies and Partners who run the Health Clinic in Llanidloes. There is no doctor resident in the village. Health visitors attend those who cannot attend the clinic due to permanent sickness. One cares for those with general illnesses, and one for those with mental illness. There is a Cottage Hospital in Llanidloes which can cope with minor emergencies and some long term geriatric cases, but serious illnesses are catered for at Bronglais Hospital, Aberystwyth. This means an ambulance journey of 23 miles. There is a dental clinic for general patients, and a school dental clinic in Llanidloes.
